description:
1.2.5 update:

THE NEXT 7 REVIEWERS TO LEAVE A 5-STAR REVIEW WITH THEIR NAME WILL HAVE A FART NAMED IN THEIR HONOR IN VERSION 1.3 TO BE RELEASED IN TWO WEEKS.  1.2.5 WINNERS ARE: drheathenscum, steve hallmann, brian doherty, mike likens, juan martinez.  If I missed your name, please email me at gordon@awesomephoneapps.com and it will be included in the next release this Friday.


Other updates:

*improved quality / louder sounds
*a handful of new inspirational messages
*resolve the "open window" bug in the upcoming WebOS 1.4.5!!! phones.  (bug was introduced with Palm's 1.4 update. )

******************
Can't afford to go to the movies anymore?  This app will provide you with almost unlimited entertainment value.  In addition to the highest-quality fart sounds this author licensed at a very low point in his life, every fart is accompanied by a humorous or inspirational message.  Fun for the whole family with a user interface engineered for maximum usability.  SERIOUSLY, THOUGH -- These apps are pretty annoying, so we are releasing this one in the hopes of discouraging anybody else from publishing a fart app.  To make this happen, we really did use the loudest, clearest sounds we could find, have a TON of them (25), and are donating 15% of the proceeds to Red Cross (confirmation will be posted to developer's site).  Hopefully nobody else will bother competing and we can create space for more useful apps :)
